com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx

Class DnxSectionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx.DnxSectionRecord

  • public class DnxSectionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    DnxSectionRecord defines a layer above the org.dom4j.Element for accessing a DNX record
    Author:
    Tsachm

    DnxSectionRecord defines a layer above the org.dom4j.Element for accessing a DNX record

      • createKey

        public DnxRecordKey createKey(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String q1,
                     java.lang.String q2,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Creates a new section key in the current DNXRecord with id,q1,q2 and the value given as parameters
        The operation adds a new section key to the underlying org.dom4j.Element
        and to the arrayList of existing DnxRecordKey objects. For example:
        DnxSection newDnxSection = dnxDocument.createSection(DNXConstants.CONTROL.sectionId);
        DnxSectionRecord newDnxRecord = newDnxSection.createRecord();

        DnxRecordKey newRecordKey = newDnxRecord.createKey("key1",null,null,"value1");

        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the section key
        q1 - The first qualifier of the section key
        q2 - The second qualifier of the section key
        value - The value of the section key
        Returns:
        The newly created DnxRecordKey object

      • getKeyById

        public DnxRecordKey getKeyById(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the DnxRecordKey object with the given ID that the current DNXSectionRecord contains
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the section key
        Returns:
        the DnxRecordKey object with the given ID, or "null" if the ID is not present

      • updateKey

        public void updateKey(java.lang.String keyId,
             java.lang.String value)
        Updates or creates a section key value.
        Note:
        1) The method creates a key according to the given key identifier if no such key exists.
        2) The method assumes the first occurrence of a section record.

        Parameters:
        keyId - the section key identifier
        value - The new string value of the key, replacing the old string value

      • getKeylist

        public java.util.List<DnxRecordKey> getKeylist()
        Returns the list of DnxRecordKey that the current DNXSectionRecord contains
        Returns:
        the list of DnxRecordKey that the current DNXSectionRecord contains

      • getSectionKeyValue

        public java.lang.String getSectionKeyValue(java.lang.String sectionKeyId)
        Returns the value of the given section key as a string.
        Parameters:
        sectionKeyId - the section key identifier
        Returns:
        the value of the given sectionKey as a string or "null" if no such key exists

      • getElement

        public org.dom4j.Element getElement()
